content:
alexcrichton opened PR #11432 from alexcrichton:wasmtime-unsafe-op-in-unsafe-fn to bytecodealliance:main:

Turns out this was already done, so all that was left was to fiddle with some directives.

Closes #11180

  • Explain why this change is needed. If the details are in an issue already,
    this can be brief.

Our development process is documented in the Wasmtime book:

alexcrichton edited PR #11432:

Just a few unsafe blocks remained

Closes #11180
